verses.name: Ezra 10:10
verses.text: And Ezra the priest stood up, and said unto them, Ye have transgressed, and have taken strange wives, to increase the trespass of Israel.

verses.name: Ezra 10:11
verses.text: Now therefore make confession unto the Lord God of your fathers, and do his pleasure: and separate yourselves from the people of the land, and from the strange wives.

verses.name: Ezra 10:12
verses.text: Then all the congregation answered and said with a loud voice, As thou hast said, so must we do.
